title: ‘A 17-Watt Advantage’: How Wout van Aert Raced a Full Disc Wheelset to Olympic Bronze
content:
Wheel choice, and a puncture from Josh Tarling, help Van Aert earn emotional bronze medal: 'It's only a bronze, but I can be proud of that.'

Read the full article at ‘A 17-Watt Advantage’: How Wout van Aert Raced a Full Disc Wheelset to Olympic Bronze on Velo.
author: ahood
